commit.message: Make printin the backtrace more convenient

files.patch:
@@ -1197,7 +1197,6 @@ name = "profile"
 version = "0.0.0"
 dependencies = [
  "arena",
- "backtrace",
  "cfg-if 1.0.0",
  "libc",
  "once_cell",
@@ -1566,6 +1565,9 @@ dependencies = [
 [[package]]
 name = "stdx"
 version = "0.0.0"
+dependencies = [
+ "backtrace",
+]
 
 [[package]]
 name = "syn"

@@ -13,7 +13,6 @@ doctest = false
 once_cell = "1.3.1"
 cfg-if = "1"
 libc = "0.2.73"
-backtrace = { version = "0.3.44", optional = true }
 
 arena = { path = "../arena", version = "0.0.0" }
 
@@ -24,5 +23,4 @@ perf-event = "0.4"
 cpu_profiler = []
 
 # Uncomment to enable for the whole crate graph
-# default = [ "backtrace" ]
 # default = [ "cpu_profiler" ]

@@ -10,4 +10,9 @@ edition = "2018"
 doctest = false
 
 [dependencies]
+backtrace = { version = "0.3.44", optional = true }
 # Think twice before adding anything here
+
+[features]
+# Uncomment to enable for the whole crate graph
+# default = [ "backtrace" ]
